text: Gamer Network Limited is a UK company focused on digital media and mainly video game journalism. It was first started 4 September 1999. It is based in Brighton, England. The company was known as Eurogamer Network Limited from 1999 until 2013. On 1 March 2013, Eurogamer Network would change its name to Gamer Network. On 26 February 2018, ReedPop purchased Gamer Network. ReedPop are also the owners of the video game convention PAX. ==Brands and partners== Throughout its existence, Gamer Network has acquired and partnered with many different companies and websites. ===Brands=== ====Current==== * Dicebreaker * Eurogamer * GamesIndustry.biz * Outside Xbox and Outside Xtra * Rock Paper Shotgun * VG247 * Popverse * Jelly Deals * The Haul ====Former==== * Gamer Creative * Gamer's Edition * Metabomb * USgamer (USG) * Cosplay Central ===Partners=== * Nintendo Life * Push Square * Pure Xbox * Road to VR * Time Extension * Video Games Chronicle (VGC) * Mod DB * Indie DB ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1999 establishments in England Category:Companies of England Category:Video game companies of the United Kingdom
title: Gamer Network
